description:
Students will work on a student consulting practicum
project jointly identified by the company and the CAMRI
professors. The project could range from a problem
statement which needs a solution to be recommended or
a feasibility study of a specific area of interest. At the end
of the project, students will be required to present their
project to the company management and professors
jointly for their assessment. The objective of the project
should be to provide an actionable item or valuable
insights to the company – as directed.
title: Experiential Industry Attachment Programme (EIAP)
